summary.span: 返回一次匹配中捕获的组的集。

span.span: Returns the set of captured groups in a single match.

summary.span: 该集合是不可变的（只读），没有公共构造函数。

span.span: The collection is immutable (read-only) and has no public constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个从零开始的集合类，它包含一个或多个 对象，这些对象提供有关正则表达式匹配中的捕获组的信息。The class is a zero-based collection class that consists of one or more objects that provide information about captured groups in a regular expression match. 该集合是不可变的（只读），没有公共构造函数。The collection is immutable (read-only) and has no public constructor. 对象由 属性返回。A object is returned by the property. 集合包含一个或多个 对象。The collection contains one or more objects. 如果匹配成功，则集合中的第一个元素包含与整个匹配项对应的 对象。If the match is successful, the first element in the collection contains the object that corresponds to the entire match. 如果正则表达式包含捕获组，则每个后续元素都表示捕获的组。Each subsequent element represents a captured group, if the regular expression includes capturing groups. 与已命名的捕获组匹配之前，从编号（未命名）捕获组中的匹配显示为数值顺序。Matches from numbered (unnamed) capturing groups appear in numeric order before matches from named capturing groups. 如果匹配不成功，则集合将包含一个 对象，该对象的 属性为 `false`，其 属性等于 。If the match is unsuccessful, the collection contains a single object whose property is `false` and whose property equals . 有关详细信息，请参阅[分组构造](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md)一文中的 "分组构造和正则表达式对象" 一节。For more information, see the "Grouping Constructs and Regular Expression Objects" section in the [Grouping Constructs](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md) article. 若要循环访问集合的成员，应使用语言提供的集合迭代构造（如中C#的 `foreach` 和 `For Each`...`Next`To iterate through the members of the collection, you should use the collection iteration construct provided by your language (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic 中），而不是检索 方法返回的枚举器。in Visual Basic) instead of retrieving the enumerator that is returned by the method. 此外，你还可以从 "" 属性（中C#的索引器）访问单独的已编号捕获组，并且可以从 "" 属性访问单个命名捕获组。In addition, you can access individual numbered captured groups from the property (the indexer in C#), and you can access individual named captured groups from the property. 请注意，可以通过分别调用 和 方法，检索包含所有捕获组的数字和名称的数组。Note that you can retrieve an array that contains the numbers and names of all capturing groups by calling the and methods, respectively. 两者都是实例方法，并且需要实例化表示要匹配的正则表达式的 对象。Both are instance methods and require that you instantiate a object that represents the regular expression to be matched. ## Examples 下面的示例将正则表达式与捕获组结合使用，以便提取有关文本中使用的商标和注册商标的信息。The following example uses a regular expression with capturing groups to extract information about trademarks and registered trademarks used in text. 正则表达式模式是 `\b(\w+?)([\u00AE\u2122])`的，如下表所示。The regular expression pattern is `\b(\w+?)([\u00AE\u2122])`, which is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|查找单词边界。Look for a word boundary.| |`(\w+?)`|查找一个或多个单词字符。Look for one or more word characters. 它们共同构成了商标字名称。Together, these form the trademarked name. （请注意，此正则表达式假定商标包含一个词。）这是第一个捕获组。(Note that this regular expression assumes that a trademark consists of a single word.) This is the first capturing group.| |`([\u00AE\u2122])`|查找®或™字符。Look for either the ® or the ™ character. 这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.| 对于每个匹配项， 包含三个 对象。For each match, the contains three objects. 第一个对象包含与整个正则表达式匹配的字符串。The first object contains the string that matches the entire regular expression. 第二个对象（表示第一个捕获的组）包含产品名称。The second object, which represents the first captured group, contains the product name. 第三个对象（表示第二个捕获组）包含商标或注册商标符号。The third object, which represents the second captured group, contains the trademark or registered trademark symbol. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection/cs/Example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection/vb/Example1.vb#1)]

span.span: The array the collection is to be copied into.

param.span: 目标数组中开始复制的位置。

span.span: The position in the destination array where the copying is to begin.

summary.span: 将集合的所有元素复制到给定数组中（从给定索引处开始）。

span.span: Copies all the elements of the collection to the given array beginning at the given index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于整个集合从给定索引处开始复制到数组中，因此目标数组的大小必须至少与集合大。Because the entire collection is copied into the array starting at the given index, the destination array must be at least as large as the collection. > [!WARNING] > [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]中不存在此成员。This member is not present in the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]. 如果要开发面向 [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)]的应用程序，请改用 方法。If you are developing applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_portable](~/includes/net-portable-md.md)], use the method instead. ## Examples 下面的示例从句子提取每个单词并在捕获组中捕获它，然后使用 方法将每个匹配的 对象中的元素复制到一个数组，该数组包含来自所有匹配项的捕获组。The following example extracts each word from a sentence and captures it in a capturing group, The method is then used to copy the elements in each match's object to an array that contains the capturing groups from all matches. 然后，会向控制台显示单个捕获的字词。The individual captured words are then displayed to the console. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.copyto/cs/copyto1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.copyto/vb/copyto1.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 正则表达式的定义如下：The regular expression is defined as follows: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|与字边界匹配。Match a word boundary.| |`(\S+?)`|匹配一个或多个非空白字符。Match one or more non-white space characters. 将其分配给第一个捕获组。Assign them to the first capturing group.| |`\b`|与字边界匹配。Match a word boundary.|

is outside the bounds of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是调用 方法来检索枚举器，该枚举数可用于循环访问集合中的 对象，而应使用组迭代构造（如和 `For Each`中C#的 `foreach` ...`Next`Instead of calling the method to retrieve an enumerator that lets you iterate through the objects in the collection, you should use the group iteration construct (such as `foreach` in C# and `For Each`…`Next` 在 Visual Basic）中，由您的编程语言提供。in Visual Basic) that is provided by your programming language.

member this.IsReadOnly : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示集合是否为只读集合。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is read-only.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只读集合不允许在创建集合后添加或删除元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created. 请注意，在此上下文中为只读并不表示是否可以修改集合中的单个元素，因为 接口仅支持添加和删除操作。Note that read-only in this context does not indicate whether individual elements of the collection can be modified, since the interface only supports addition and removal operations. 例如，强制转换或转换为 对象的数组的 属性返回 `true`，即使可以修改单个数组元素也是如此。For example, the property of an array that is cast or converted to an object returns `true`, even though individual array elements can be modified.

param.span: 要检索的集合成员的索引（从零开始）。

span.span: Enables access to a member of the collection by integer index.

value.span: 由 指定的集合的成员。

span.span: The member of the collection specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是 类的索引（ C#在中）或默认属性（在 Visual Basic 中）。The property is the index (in C#) or the default property (in Visual Basic) of the class. 通过使用中C#的 `foreach` 语句或 Visual Basic 中的 `For Each` 语句，可枚举集合的成员。It allows you to enumerate the members of the collection by using a `foreach` statement in C# or a `For Each` statement in Visual Basic. 你还可以使用此属性按其索引号检索单个捕获的组。You can also use this property to retrieve individual captured groups by their index number. 您可以通过调用实例 方法，在正则表达式中检索包含所有捕获组的数量的数组。You can retrieve an array that contains the numbers of all capturing groups in a regular expression by calling the instance method. 还可以通过调用实例 方法，将命名捕获组映射到其数字。You can also map named capturing groups to their numbers by calling the instance method. 可以通过检索 属性的值来确定集合中的项数。You can determine the number of items in the collection by retrieving the value of the property. `groupnum` 参数的有效值范围为0到集合中的项数减1之间的值。Valid values for the `groupnum` parameter range from 0 to one less than the number of items in the collection. 属性返回的 对象始终具有至少一个成员。The object returned by the property always has at least one member. 如果正则表达式引擎在特定输入字符串中找不到任何匹配项，则集合中的单个 对象的 属性设置为 `false`，并将其 `Group.Value` 属性设置为 。If the regular expression engine cannot find any matches in a particular input string, the single object in the collection has its property set to `false` and its `Group.Value` property set to . 如果 `groupnum` 不是集合成员的索引，或者 `groupnum` 是输入字符串中未匹配的捕获组的索引，则该方法将返回一个 对象，其 属性为 `false`，其 `Group.Value` 属性为 。If `groupnum` is not the index of a member of the collection, or if `groupnum` is the index of a capturing group that has not been matched in the input string, the method returns a object whose property is `false` and whose `Group.Value` property is . ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个由两个编号组组成的正则表达式。The following example defines a regular expression that consists of two numbered groups. 第一组捕获一个或多个连续的数字。The first group captures one or more consecutive digits. 第二个组匹配单个字符。The second group matches a single character. 由于正则表达式引擎查找第一个组的零个或一个匹配项，因此即使正则表达式匹配成功，它也不会始终找到匹配项。Because the regular expression engine looks for zero or one occurrence of the first group, it does not always find a match even if the regular expression match is successful. 然后，该示例说明了在使用 属性检索不匹配的组、匹配组和正则表达式中未定义的组时的结果。The example then illustrates the result when the property is used to retrieve an unmatched group, a matched group, and a group that is not defined in the regular expression. 该示例定义了正则表达式模式 `(\d+)*(\w)\2`，如下表所示。The example defines a regular expression pattern `(\d+)*(\w)\2`, which is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\d+)*`|匹配一个或多个十进制数字的匹配项。Match one or more occurrence of a decimal digit. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group. 匹配此模式零次或一次。Match this pattern either zero or one time.| |`(\w)`|这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.| |`\k`|与第二个捕获组捕获的字符串匹配。Match the string captured by the second capturing group.| :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/cs/item3.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/vb/item3.vb" id="Snippet2":::

related.span: 正则表达式中的分组构造

span.span: Grouping Constructs in Regular Expressions

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group this[string groupname] { get; }
.property instance class System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group Item(string)

member this.Item(string) : System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group

param.name: groupname
param.span: 捕获组的名称。

span.span: The name of a capturing group.

summary.span: 允许通过字符串索引访问集合成员。

span.span: Enables access to a member of the collection by string index.

value.span: 由 指定的集合的成员。

span.span: The member of the collection specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `groupName` 可以是正则表达式中的 `(?<`*名称*`>)` 元素定义的捕获组的名称，也可以是由分组构造定义的捕获组数的字符串表示形式。`groupName` can be either the name of a capturing group that is defined by the `(?<`*name*`>)` element in a regular expression, or the string representation of the number of a capturing group that is defined by a grouping construct. 有关正则表达式中的组的详细信息，请参阅[分组构造](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md)。For more information about groups in regular expressions, see [Grouping Constructs](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md). 您可以通过调用 方法检索 对象中所有捕获组的名称。You can retrieve the names of all the captured groups in a object by calling the method. 还可以通过调用 方法，将正则表达式中的捕获组数映射到其名称。You can also map the numbers of capturing groups in a regular expression to their names by calling the method. 然后，可以将数组中的各个名称传递到 属性以检索捕获的字符串。Individual names from the array can then be passed to the property to retrieve the captured string. 如果 `groupname` 不是集合中的捕获组的名称，或者 `groupname` 是未在输入字符串中匹配的捕获组的名称，则该方法将返回一个 对象，其 属性为 `false`，其 `Group.Value` 属性为 。If `groupname` is not the name of a capturing group in the collection, or if `groupname` is the name of a capturing group that has not been matched in the input string, the method returns a object whose property is `false` and whose `Group.Value` property is . ## Examples 下面的示例定义包含两个命名组的正则表达式。The following example defines a regular expression that consists of two named groups. `numbers`第一个组捕获一个或多个连续数字。The first group, `numbers`, captures one or more consecutive digits. 第二组 `letter`匹配单个字符。The second group, `letter`, matches a single character. 由于正则表达式引擎查找 `numbers` 组定义的模式的零个或一个匹配项，因此即使匹配成功，也不会始终存在 `numbers` 组。Because the regular expression engine looks for zero or one occurrence of the pattern defined by the `numbers` group, the `numbers` group is not always present even if a match is successful. 然后，该示例说明了在使用 属性检索不匹配的组、匹配组和正则表达式中未定义的组时的结果。The example then illustrates the result when the property is used to retrieve an unmatched group, a matched group, and a group that is not defined in the regular expression. 该示例定义了正则表达式模式 `(?\d+)*(?\w)\k`，如下表所示。The example defines a regular expression pattern `(?\d+)*(?\w)\k`, which is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(?\d+)*`|匹配一个或多个十进制数字的匹配项。Match one or more occurrence of a decimal digit. 将此命名为 `numbers` 捕获组。Name this the `numbers` capturing group. 匹配此模式零次或一次。Match this pattern either zero or one time.| |`(?\w)`|匹配单个单词字符。Match a single word character. 将此命名为 `letter` 捕获组。Name this the `letter` capturing group.| |`\k`|匹配 `letter` 捕获组捕获的字符串。Match the string captured by the `letter` capturing group.| :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/cs/item2.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.groupcollection.item/vb/item2.vb" id="Snippet1":::

The name keys of the group collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可枚举集合中键的顺序是未指定的，但实现必须保证键的顺序与 属性返回的可枚举集合中对应值的顺序相同。The order of the keys in the enumerable collection is unspecified, but the implementation must guarantee that the keys are in the same order as the corresponding values in the enumerable collection that is returned by the property.
